# dns_ptr_record_set (Data Source)

Use this data source to get DNS PTR record set of the ip address.

## Example Usage

```python
# DO NOT EDIT. Code generated by 'cdktf convert' - Please report bugs at https://cdk.tf/bug
from constructs import Construct
from cdktf import TerraformOutput, TerraformStack
#
# Provider bindings are generated by running `cdktf get`.
# See https://cdk.tf/provider-generation for more details.
#
from imports.dns.data_dns_ptr_record_set import DataDnsPtrRecordSet
class MyConvertedCode(TerraformStack):
    def __init__(self, scope, name):
        super().__init__(scope, name)
        hashicorp = DataDnsPtrRecordSet(self, "hashicorp",
            ip_address="8.8.8.8"
        )
        TerraformOutput(self, "hashi_ptr",
            value=hashicorp.ptr
        )
```

<!-- schema generated by tfplugindocs -->
## Schema

### Required

- `ip_address` (String) IP address to look up.

### Read-Only

- `id` (String) Always set to the IP address.
- `ptr` (String) A PTR record associated with `ip_address`.
